main event: A watchman observed a single yellow object changing from small to large in size, with a halo around the top, making circular turns at a high altitude for 3 hours.
interesting points: The object changed in size from small to large.
The object had a yellow color with a halo around the top.
The object made basic circular turns at a high altitude.
The report states the witness was reliable.
sighted object: a single yellow object changing in size with a halo around the top
